20101229190657.000|20101229190657.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20101229190657.000|20101229190700.000|CC1|ROADS TO BIG BEAR WILL REMAIN   
20101229190700.000|20101229190701.000|CC1|CLOSED INDEFINITELY THANKS TO   
20101229190701.000|20101229190702.000|CC1|RECENT STORM DAMAGE.            
20101229190702.000|20101229190705.000|CC1|PART OF HIGHWAY 330 IS SHUT     
20101229190705.000|20101229190706.000|CC1|DOWN.                           
20101229190706.000|20101229190712.000|CC1|LAST WEEK'S HEAVY RAINS AND     
20101229190712.000|20101229190712.000|CC1|MUDSLIDES ERODED THE HIGHWAY    
20101229190712.000|20101229190717.000|CC1|AND CAUSED IT TO SLIDE DOWN THE 
20101229190717.000|20101229190717.000|CC1|HILL.                           
20101229190717.000|20101229190718.000|CC1|CALTRANS IS CHECKING THE        
20101229190718.000|20101229190719.000|CC1|CONDITIONS OF OUR SECTIONS OF   
20101229190719.000|20101229190720.000|CC1|THE ROAD.

20101229190721.000|20101229190723.000|CC1|CHANCE HIGHWAY 330 WILL NOT     
20101229190723.000|20101229190724.000|CC1|REOPEN UNTIL WINTER IS OVER.    
20101229190724.000|20101229190726.000|CC1|HOWEVER, YOU CAN STILL GET TO   
20101229190726.000|20101229190729.000|CC1|BIG BEAR USING HIGHWAYS 18 OR

20101229190731.000|20101229190732.000|CC1|P.C.H. IS STILL SHUT DOWN       
20101229190732.000|20101229190734.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF A ROCK SLIDE.        
20101229190734.000|20101229190736.000|CC1|HIGHWAY IS CLOSED IN BOTH       
20101229190736.000|20101229190739.000|CC1|DIRECTIONS FROM DEER CREEK IN   
20101229190739.000|20101229190742.000|CC1|MALIBU TO LAS POSAS ROAD IN     
20101229190742.000|20101229190744.000|CC1|VENTURA COUNTY.                 
20101229190744.000|20101229190745.000|CC1|THIS SAME SECTION OF P.C.H. WAS
